    • toDouble

      public double toDouble()
      Converts the fraction to its decimal form. Returns the decimal value with three decimal places for better output view, though less accurate.
      Returns:
      The decimal form of the fraction with three decimal places.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the string representation of the fraction. If the denominator is 0, returns "undefined" (for division). If the numerator is 0 or the denominator is 1, returns only the numerator. Otherwise, returns the fraction in the format "numerator/denominator".
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation of the fraction.

    • reduce

      public void reduce()
      Reduces the fraction to its simplest form by dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor (GCD).

    • add

      public Fraction add(Fraction anotherFraction)
      Adds another fraction to this fraction.

      The method computes the result of adding the specified anotherFraction to this fraction and sets the numerator and denominator accordingly. It uses the formula: 

         resultNumerator = (this.numerator * anotherFraction.getDenominator() +
                      anotherFraction.getNumerator() * this.denominator);
   resultDenominator = (this.denominator * anotherFraction.getDenominator());

      After setting the numerator and denominator, the method reduces the fraction to its simplest form by dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor (GCD).

      Parameters:
      anotherFraction - the fraction to be added to this fraction

    • subtract

      public Fraction subtract(Fraction anotherFraction)
      Subtracts another fraction from this fraction.

      The method computes the result of subtracting the specified anotherFraction from this fraction and sets the numerator and denominator accordingly. It uses the formula: 

         resultNumerator = (this.numerator * anotherFraction.getDenominator() -
                      anotherFraction.getNumerator() * this.numerator);
   resultDenominator = (this.denominator * anotherFraction.getDenominator());

      After setting the numerator and denominator, the method reduces the fraction to its simplest form by dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor (GCD).

      Parameters:
      anotherFraction - the fraction to be subtracted from this fraction

    • multiplyBy

      public Fraction multiplyBy(Fraction anotherFraction)
      Multiplies this fraction by another fraction.

      The method computes the result of multiplying this fraction by the specified anotherFraction and sets the numerator and denominator accordingly. It uses the formula: 

         resultNumerator = (this.numerator * anotherFraction.getNumerator());
   resultDenominator = (this.denominator * anotherFraction.getDenominator());

      After setting the numerator and denominator, the method reduces the fraction to its simplest form by dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor (GCD).

      Parameters:
      anotherFraction - the fraction to be multiplied by this fraction

    • divideBy

      public Fraction divideBy(Fraction anotherFraction)
      Divides this fraction by another fraction.

      The method computes the result of dividing this fraction by the specified anotherFraction and sets the numerator and denominator accordingly. It uses the formula: 

         resultNumerator = (this.numerator * anotherFraction.getDenominator());
   resultDenominator = (this.denominator * anotherFraction.getNumerator());

      After setting the numerator and denominator, the method reduces the fraction to its simplest form by dividing both the numerator and denominator by their greatest common divisor (GCD).

      Parameters:
      anotherFraction - the fraction to divide this fraction by
